= An Example for the usage of the --call-cmd switch =

[http://code.google.com/p/gastify/source/browse/trunk/extras/placecall.sh Here] is a bash script which uses the asterisk manager to make a call.
Add a user with the permissions to make calls in the manager.conf from asterisk.
Fill out the variables on top of the script and use it like this:

{{{ gastify -dc /usr/local/bin/placecall.sh }}}
